net.photopay.ocr

Interface PaymentRecognizerDelegate


  • public interface PaymentRecognizerDelegate

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DETECTION_STATUS_BLURRY_FRAME
      Form is detected, but parts of the form are not in image
      static int DETECTION_STATUS_CAMERA_TOO_HIGH
      Form detected, but the camera is too far above the payment form
      static int DETECTION_STATUS_FAIL
      Detection failed, form not detected
      static int DETECTION_STATUS_FALLBACK_SUCCESS
      fallback detection was successful
      static int DETECTION_STATUS_PARTIAL_FORM
      Form is detected, but parts of the form are not in image
      static int DETECTION_STATUS_PDF417_SUCCESS
      PDF417 barcode detected
      static int DETECTION_STATUS_QR_SUCCESS
      QR code detected
      static int DETECTION_STATUS_SUCCESS
      Payment form detected

    • Method Detail

      • onDetectionStarted

        void onDetectionStarted()
        Method called when detection starts

      • onDetectionFailed

        void onDetectionFailed()
        Method called when detection has failed.

      • onDetectedForm

        boolean onDetectedForm(float[] points,
                     int detectionStatus,
                     int uleftIndex)
        Method called when form was detected.
        Parameters:
        points - Points of interest for detected form.
        detectionStatus - Status of detection.
        uleftIndex - Which point is the actual upper-left point.
        Returns:
        true if the recognition process should continue, otherwise false

      • publishProgress

        void publishProgress(int progress)
        Called to notify UI about recognition progress.
        Parameters:
        progress - Progress of recognition from interval [0, 100].

      • shouldRecognitionStop

        boolean shouldRecognitionStop()
        Called to check whether or not native recognition should terminate.
        Returns:
        true if recognition should terminate, otherwise false

      • onRecognitionStarted

        void onRecognitionStarted()
        Called when recognition starts.

      • onRecognitionFinished

        void onRecognitionFinished(net.photopay.ocr.PaymentData paymentData)
        Called when recognition ends.
        Parameters:
        paymentData - Recognition result

      • setPaused

        void setPaused(boolean isPaused)
        Called when delegate should be notified that UI is going to sleep.
        Parameters:
        isPaused - true if should pause recognition
